title: dot-env
description: A lightweight and easy-to-use library for loading environment variables from a .env file into the process.env object in Node.js applications.

title: Todo App
description: I developed a Todo app with a API using express and MongoDB for the backend, emphasizing maintenance and scalability. The frontend is built using React.js and TailwindCSS.

title: Simple Blog
description: I created a Simple blog based on .md files, using Gatsby.js

title: URL Shortener
description: A basic URL shortener using Node.js, Nest and MongoDB.
